1.content:
God decided randomly to entrust his powers to some human. He took out his roulette board, selected one nominee for each pocket, and rolled the ball.

Who did it land on?
1.title: God's Split-Second Decision

choices: Make herself into a sex goddess. (Pun intended.)
Use her power to help people.
111.content:
Amelia Branford, age 15. 5'2", long black hair, hazel eyes. She has a flat chest and is abnormally pale. She's skeptical, cynical, sarcastic, and frequently self-depreciating.


A vast darkness, but it wasn't dark. It stretched to infinity, but every inch of it was amazingly close to her. She was standing on something, but nothing was below her.

Amelia knew full well she was dreaming. However, even knowing it was a dream didn't keep her from being amazed at the sight before her. She'd had lucid dreams before, but she'd never been this lucid at all.

And before her, there stood a man.

No, not a man. A boy. A boy of roughly sixteen years old, one year older than Amelia.

"Welcome," the boy said, "to my humble abode."

Amelia's sense of humor took hold of her. "Dreary place," she said. "Would it kill you to clean up a bit? Maybe put in some furniture?"

The boy chuckled. "You're an amusing one," he said. "Most people say something like, 'I must be dreaming', or something reverent like "I tremble in your presence, O Almighty'."

“What, you want me to kowtow?” Amelia snorted. “To some…” She couldn’t find the words to describe this person because every aspect of him seemed to shift when she wasn’t looking at it. One moment he would have brown eyes and blond hair, the next he would be so dark-skinned he might as well be a charcoal briquette, and then he looked like a high school footballer.

“I never said I wanted you to do anything,” the boy said. “However, I will ask you something like that right now. Do you want my position for a cosmic day?”

“Excuse me?” Amelia said. “Do I want your position? Who are you first?”

“I have gone by many names. Odin, Chronos, Brahman, Ra, Yahweh or Jehovah interchangeably. But my most common name is God.”

Amelia flicked her eyes from his emerald-green left eye to his sky-blue right one, then back to the left one which had changed to her exact shade of Hazel. “What, so you want me to take over as God?” She laughed. “All right then, Your Lordliness. I’ll accept, if you’re the real thing. What will you do in the meantime?”

“Sleeping,” God said. “For the rest of the cosmic day. You would not believe how much sleep I lose over My creation. If God sleeps, then the world is destroyed. So I want to leave My powers in someone else’s hands to sustain the world until I wake up, let them be God. I did that once before, you know, for My son. But he’s gone now, so I need to hand the reins over to someone else. I chose you.”

“Just get it over with already,” Amelia said.

“Okay,” God said. “Good night.” He disappeared, and Amelia sat bolt upright in her bed, wondering why she had had such a strange dream.

She groaned, stripped off her pajamas, laid them on her bed, and took a look at herself in the mirror.
She wasn’t attractive at all. If nothing else, she looked like a tall preteen with her height, long hair, and A-cup breasts.

“I wish these were bigger,” she said aloud, trying to heft her breasts and failing because there was nothing to heft. Then she vaguely noticed something… were her breasts getting bigger? Were they pushing gently against the skin covering them, and then with more force? Oh my God, they were! Speaking of God, she recalled her dream. She had dismissed it as bullcrap, but maybe there was something to it after all…

She grinned. The possibilities were literally endless.
111.title: Amelia Branford Almighty

choices: He makes other people have spontaneous orgasms.
He goes to school to have fun with his powers.
121.content:
Tom Smith was a typical 13 year old English boy. He was in Year 8 at school and was into the same things as any other boy his age, mainly sex. He was a virgin, but that was soon to change...

Tom opened his eyes to find himself stood in a completely black void that seemed to go on forever. He was completely naked, but made no attempt to cover himself, even when an old man appeared in front of him.
"Hello Tom," said the man.
"Uh..hi," Tom replied, confused by the situation.
"I suppose you're wondering what's happening."
"Well yeah."
"It's simple really," the old man began. "I'm God, and I've decided to give you all of my powers. Not permanently of course, but long enough for you to enjoy them. Now then, I believe it's time for you to get started as God.

Tom opened his eyes and awoke to find himself in his bed, still naked.
"Odd," he thought. "I'm sure I was wearing pajamas when I went to bed." It was then that he remembered the dream he had.
"Could it be true?" he thought. "Only one way to find out." He looked down at his dick and focused. Instantly it became hard as stone.
"Oh my God it worked," he said. He began stroking it, but then had another thought. He focused his power on his dick, and let out a loud moan.
"OOOOOOOOOOOOHHHHHH GOOOOOOOD!" he moaned as he had an intense spontaneous orgasm. He shot his cum into the air and it landed on his chest. He thrust his hips into the air as his orgasm continued. Nearly a full minute later, when he'd completely exhausted his semen supply, his orgasm ended, and he laid there, panting.
121.title: Tom Smith Almighty

choices: Tom spots a lonely guy in the gym
Tom spots a skinny kid in the schoolyard
Tom finds another student on the way home
1212.content:
Tom decided to practice using his cool, new powers at school, specifically, in the weight room. After all, one of the coolest things he wanted to do was grow the muscles on some of his buddies at school, especially those guys who were skinny, short and nerdy. They were always the targets of bullying by the bigger guys, and they never had much of a chance to grow any bigger. So, Tom wanted to see who he could change, and how easy it was to do so.

Tom wandered around the small gym and spotted Stephen working out on one of the machines, all the way in the far back corner. Stephen was rather shy, so he tried to stay away from the bigger guys, who usually worked out around the free weights area. Stephen was just over 5 feet tall with black hair and brown eyes. He wore glasses and he just kept to himself. He started working out in the gym just because he wasn’t exercising at all, and his counselor advised him to do something in order to stay in shape. Stephen started gaining a few pounds during the first semester, so he wanted to work out just to keep the weight off.

Tom quietly walked over to the lats pulldown machine as Stephen sat on the leg extension machine. He did about four reps, before he let his legs drop down. He was clearly tired. And, no wonder, his legs were hurting, even though he was only lifting 25 pounds. Stephen was wearing shorts and a tank top, which showed how skinny he was. His legs were short and thin. Tom almost felt sorry for him. Stephen just leaned back against the chair and rested, closing his eyes and breathing heavily. He was exhausted.

“Time for Stephen to muscle up” Tom thought quietly. “He has suffered enough. Tom needs to become a teenage bodybuilder, right… NOW!”

Something strange occurred in that weight room. Luckily, Tom was the only person who noticed anything unusual. Stephen was overcome by an odd, intense tingling sensation as he relaxed on the leg extension machine. The feeling felt good, in a way. While Stephen was overcome by these feelings, all his muscles started to grow, just as Tom had commanded!

First, Stephen’s pectorals bulged from his chest, growing quickly into large mounds of muscle. This forced his shoulders to widen considerably. The boy’s arms inflated with thick, solid muscles as his biceps and triceps followed suit. Next, his flat stomach was suddenly covered with washboard abdominal muscles, making him look like a ripped athlete! Stephen instantly resembled a guy who had been lifting weights in the gym for years already!

Stephen let out a loud moan as his muscles continued to grow. The kid’s quads grew into mighty, vertical pillars of thick, wide columns of muscle which ran from his waist to his knees. His calves inflated like helium balloons, exploding into soccer balls sticking out from the back of his legs. Stephen was suddenly so buff; he could barely sit on the leg extension machine anymore just because his legs had grown too wide!

“Come on, one more set…” Stephen sighed as he did one more set of 30 reps, lifting 115 pounds on the machine, far more and much heavier weights than he was doing just three minutes ago. His legs were screaming with power, but he was loving it!

Stephen finally stood up and flexed. His arms, his chest, and his legs were just enormous! He looked like a totally cool, young, teenage muscle man. Nobody ever dared bullying him anymore. Stephen was the nicest and the smartest guy in his class, and he had the biggest biceps of all the guys in his grade level. Plus, all the girls would gather around him and rub his massive biceps when he arrived at the schoolyard in the morning. They all asked him questions about their homework assignments, since the big, hunky, lovable nerd was happy to help anyone in need.

Tom looked on and he was happy with his handiwork. As soon as Stephen got up from working out on the machine, he was surrounded by two boys and two girls, who all wanted to rub his massive muscles. Stephen remained that same, friendly guy who never taunted or bullied anyone.

“Time to find my next victim” Tom grinned, as he scanned the weight room for another guy to grow…
1212.title: He goes to school to have fun with his powers.

15.content: How about some more choices??
15.title: Someone else.

1511.content:
Joshua Handy had just finished serving as the altar boy during mass in church that morning. He was wearing a long, white robe with long sleeves and a silver chain with a cross around his neck, which he thought was really cool because it also made him look a little like a priest. He almost wished he could wear the robe longer but he knew he had to remove it as soon as mass was over.

When the people started leaving the sanctuary, Josh walked into the bathroom to change when he saw a bright light before him. Then, another boy materialized before him, wearing a brown robe with a rope tied around his waist. The boy was short, he looked around 10 years old and had black hair, and he began to speak to Josh.

"hi, Josh. I see you like to be the altar boy. That's very good. I'm going to give you my powers for one cosmic day." the boy said.

"what? Who are you?"

"You come to worship me during mass every Sunday. From now on, people will come to mass and they will worship you instead!" the boy responded.

"huh?" Josh replied.

"I am God, but you will be God from now on, while I sleep for one cosmic day." the boy said, as he placed his hands on Josh's shoulders. "You will now have all my knowledge, my wisdom and my powers. You're in charge of the universe, Josh. Everything you say, will happen. Every one of your commands will be carried out!"

The boy with black hair disappeared, leaving Josh alone in the bathroom.

Josh was 10 years old, he had blond hair and blue eyes and he was 5 feet tall. He was God.

When Josh walked out of the bathroom, he saw Father Williams, who lead the mass just a few minutes before. The Father asked Josh if he could take off his robe and place it in the closet.

"gosh, I would like to keep my robe a little longer..." Josh sighed.

Father Williams suddenly agreed.

"sure, Josh. Keep the robe as long as you want!"

Josh was astonished. The priest had never allowed that before! Josh the walked around and talked to people, suddenly knowing the names of every single person who was there, even the visitors!
1511.title: 1 Joshua Almighty

choices: Josh visits a friend at his house
15111.content:
Josh walked into the fellowship hall of the church where people were talking and enjoying some of the snacks that people brought for all to enjoy. Some of the kids were taking some of the delicious chocolate chip cookies, which were placed on a large dish on a table.

"Oh crap! All the cookies are gone!" Dennis complained, one of the other kids from church. "They were so tasty!"

Josh had just taken one of the last ones, and walked up to Dennis.

"You can have mine, if you want!" Josh said, as he shared his cookie with the other boy.

"Thanks, Josh. Just look at that empty dish! What a shame all the cookies are gone!" Dennis grumbled.

"Yeah... I want to see that dish filled with chocolate cookies again!" Josh grinned.

Then, just like magic, and just as Josh commanded, a whole new batch of freshly baked cookies appeared on the dish!

"Whoa! Did you see THAT?" Dennis exclaimed. "Look! More cookies!"

Josh just smiled. He knew he had caused those cookies to appear out of nowhere.

He couldn't wait to use his powers at school the next day!

Come Monday morning, during lunch, the workers ran out of chocolate milk during lunch recess.

"Dude... I wanted chocolate milk and now I have to settle for orange juice!" Ethan complained, as he sat down at the table, next to Josh. Both boys were eating mac and cheese, and Josh just had OJ to drink.

"Well, your OJ will turn to chocolate milk!" Josh said.

Suddenly, Ethan's orange juice had magically transformed into delicious chocolate milk! Just as Josh commanded!

"Wow! Hey! I'm drinking chocolate milk! How did that happen???" Ethan wondered out loud.

Josh didn't say anything. He just smiled.
15111.title: Josh goes to school

choices: Ethan tells all the kids about Josh being God
151112.content:
After school was over, Josh left the main classroom building and started walking out the schoolyard when Ethan ran up to him from behind.

"Hey Josh, I was wondering, would you like to come over to my house this afternoon?" he asked him.

"Sure, but let me ask my mom first."

Josh knew it wouldn't be a problem but he felt better if he would just ask his mother anyway. He lived with his mom and the two of them lived in a small apartment together since his parents were divorced and his father had moved away many years ago. Josh realized that he now had the power to bring his parents together if he wanted to, but since his father wasn't very good to his mother, he knew that it wouldn't make his mom too happy if he had forced that on her, so he let the situation remain the way it was.

As soon as Josh had walked far enough away from school, he disappeared from sight and instantly appeared standing in his bedroom. He treasured the ability to teleport everywhere and he used it every chance he had.

Josh then walked into the kitchen where his mother was preparing supper.

"mom, do you mind if I hang out at ethan's house for awhile this afternoon?" he asked his mother.

His mother didn't mind it, which was the expected answer, and so he finished his lunch and walked out the door.

As soon as Josh had gotten outside, he heard the sounds of several animals. There was a raccoon, a cat, and the chirping of a bird in a tree. Josh looked up and spotted the bird, and smiled.

"Come here, come to me!" Josh said to the bird, but somehow, the other animals instantly recognized who Josh was. They realized right away that Josh was God and their creator.

The bird leaped off the branch and flew over to Josh, neatly landing on his shoulder. The raccoon and the cat also came up to Josh, and they rubbed up against Josh's legs. A few minutes later, a stray dog came walking by, and came up to Josh, and started licking Josh's hand.

"Hey, you guys know who I am huh?" Josh grinned.

After a few minutes, Josh continued on his way, and the animals just remained standing, although they just watched him from a distance.

When Josh reached Ethan's house, he rang the doorbell and Ethan opened up. Right away, Ethan's cat and dog came up to Josh and rubbed up against his legs.

Josh then went up to Ethan's bedroom, where the two boys played video games together. They played a few games on the xbox, and Josh beat Ethan easy at everything.

When Ethan took Josh to the large bird cage out in the back of the house, all four birds flocked over to Josh and sat on Josh's shoulders. Ethan was just astonished and he couldn't understand why all the animals liked Josh so much.

Finally, Ethan's mother came home, and she started talking to the boys when she entered the bedroom. She just finished telling them that she had come back from church.

"Hi there, Josh! Thanks for coming over!" Mrs. Jones said.

"Hi Mrs. Jones. You just came from church, right?" Josh said.

"yes, I did!"

"Well, I heard your prayer for Mr. Jones. I'm sorry to hear he's sick with the flu. But, don't worry. He'll get better today!" Josh said to Ethan's mother.

That moment, Ethan's father was cured and he was no longer sick with the flu.

Ethan's mother was astonished. She just stared at Josh with a shocked look on her face.

"Josh... How could you have heard my prayers? I mean, I was praying these things in church to God!" Ethan's mother wondered.

"I hear everyone's prayers. I am God." Josh replied.

Both Ethan and his mom stared at the boy in shock.

Then, her husband came out of the room, feeling completely cured from the flu.

"See? Mr. Jones isn't sick anymore!" Josh smiled. "I answered your prayer!"

"Thank you!" both parents said, as they embraced Josh.

Everyone was happy Josh came over, and Ethan couldn't believe it. His best friend from school, who came over to play video games with him, was God!

Ethan couldn't wait to tell his friends at school about Josh.
151112.title: Josh visits a friend at his house

info.brief_description: God decides to take a break for a cosmic day, and hands his powers over to some human.
info.description:
God's taking a break, and decides to hand his power over to a randomly selected mortal... but only for a cosmic day, which depending on God's whim, might be anywhere from five minutes to a hundred years. But considering that God plans to go to sleep as soon as he hands his power over, He's not likely to take it away for quite a length of time.

Rules:
-No toilet stuff, vore, foot stuff, or oral (or anal) sex. That stuff is disgusting.
-Keep your posts long. I want genuine authors here, not people who think that writing "u r too tall, shrink dwn" is a full paragraph.
-That brings me to the next rule: Keep the grammar correct.
-Be realistic with your descriptions. If a girl starts inflating like a balloon, she should be able to feel the tautness of her skin, and so on.

I reserve the right to delete or alter ANY post for ANY reason whatsoever. Rest assured that I do not hold grudges for ANY reason whatsoever and will not delete your post just because I don't like you.
